modName: Andraste - Bride of the Maker - Lvl 1 Breton Female
summary: Inspired from Andraste - Bride of the Maker, Lady of Sorrow...
descriptionHtml:
Andraste - Bride of the Maker - Lvl 1 Breton Female v1.1
====================================================

"Its gates forever shut.
Heaven has been filled with silence,
I knew then,
And cross'd my heart with shame.
â€”Andraste 1:11 "

Inspired from Dragon Age series! I created this character even though i have no ideas how Andraste look like. But this is how i feel how she would be.

Start from lvl 1, there are 2 save file, one with Ralof and one with Hadvar to suit your choices.

*Update v1.1: fix the crashing issue, split into 2 save file, one with Hadvar and one with Ralof, all mod disabled.

*Installation: Extract & drop the file into: C:\Users\"User-Name"\Documents\My Games\Skyrim\Saves or Wherever you put your save file into! Enjoy!

*Mod Used:
-Better Females by Bella: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812 (Make up version 1)
-Covereyes by mrLenski: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4869
-Straight hair retexture by navetsea: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4333

*Credits:
Bethesda for the awesome Skyrim
BellaGail for Better Females mod
mrLenski for Covereyes
navetsea for Straight hair retextured

*Permissions: Feel free to do anythings you like!

Thanks for downloading! Please comment and endorsed if you like her!
author: HartXIII
